RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1405774232: "Dynamo failing with one multicast group in LTE (expecting more than one)"
2. 1405654761: "FWD (PCR) All delivered IP should use CTECH 2.0"
3. 1404437435: "FWD (PCR) SBR - Zircon:UPF:Low Power: Design Hierarchy repartition"
4. 1208256901: "FWD (PCR) SAI Tunneling:Add SrcID check to SBR ingress port"
5. 220127369: "FWD TGL clock gating enhancement - sideband router dfx accumulator should qualfiy EN_RST_MSFF of data_f[31:0] with feature enable, to save the dynamic power when feature is not enabled"
6. 1504483052: "FWD [ICPH][SBR] IP backend val - Spyglassdft fail"
7. 1405821676: "FWD (PCR) Request to recode RTL to work around Xprop/VCSMX tool limitation (originally filed by the misleading title Potential fatal initialization issue due to VCSMX bug)"
8. 1405681163: "FWD (PCR) IOSF Fabric Compiler - visa mux to have a step down capability of 2"
9. 1504417858: "FWD [ICPN] [SBR PICr17] IP visa insertion error - sbr*_sbr_generic_lib is not in ace scope"
10. 1405777698: "FWD (PCR) SBR - Modify RTL for TGL IP to Support for RP Flow in Backend for FIFO/Memory Structures"
11. 1209549625: "FWD (PCR) SBR Debug Enhancements:Debug TAP Registers"
12. 1504470133: "FWD DFx verif :sbr*_tap.rdl version incompatibality with DFx ctt tool."
13. 1405928000: "[1713] FEV fails for non-PGCB SBR configs"
14. 1405914017: "LKF1B (1222): Evaluate TSA 1.05.02 on RTL0p8 SIPs"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2017WW21" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
